title: How big data is unfair
description:
Head on over to Medium for a non-technical general audience piece I wrote on why machine learning is not, by default, fair or just in any meaningful way.

Since I first wrote this post thereâ€™s been some interesting follow up by Hanna Wallach. Also be sure to check out the web site of the NIPS workshop on fairness, accountability and transparency that Solon Barocas and I organized.
